channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Graffiti on metal shutters, 12th November
item.description:
There is graffiti on the metal shutters underneath the bridge, in the tunnel area. It makes the neighbourhood look messy and needs to be removed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 63, Tanner Street, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti on wall/ metal shutters., 12th November
item.description:
There is graffiti sprayed on the wall and metal shutters at this location. It doesn’t appear to belong to a shop and makes the area look untidy. Please could it be removed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 176, Tower Bridge Road, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lightling not work, 12th November
item.description:
Street lighting near number 40 not working , very dark area due to trees and unsafe for children/woman at night
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kidbrooke Park Road, Kidbrooke

item.title: Pavement Parking Box, 12th November
item.description:
In Bexley you can only park on the Pavement if there is a Blue Sign that permits it and there are white boxes painted on the pavement. The white boxes have almost worn out at this location indicated on the map. Can they be repaired to stop me and my neighbours from getting parking fines. I am not talking about WHITE BAR MARKINGS
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Northdown Road, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet
